books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.summary: A story about the Jazz Age in the United States.
quotes: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
I hope she'll be a fool — that's the best thing a girl can be in this world, a beautiful little fool.

books.author: George Orwell
books.summary: A chilling prophecy about the future.
quotes: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.summary: A young girl growing up in the racially charged South of the 1930s.
quotes: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view.
The one thing that doesn't abide by majority rule is a person's conscience.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.summary: A story of love and manners in 19th-century England.
quotes: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
I declare after all there is no enjoyment like reading!

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.summary: A young man's journey through New York City as he grapples with alienation.

comments.comment: Holden Caulfield is such a complex character.

quotes: Don't ever tell anybody anything. If you do, you start missing everybody.
People always clap for the wrong things.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.summary: The beginning of an epic journey to destroy the One Ring.
quotes: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
Not all those who wander are lost.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.summary: The adventure of Bilbo Baggins to win a share of treasure guarded by Smaug.
quotes: In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.summary: A journey of self-discovery and the pursuit of one's dreams.
quotes: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
